suggested_project.title: Everyday Oddities
suggested_project.description: A collection exploring whimsical and relatable moments, blending humor and subtle emotion in daily life.
suggested_project.based_on: Inspired by watcher-favorite themes in #2079 (relatable modern moments) and #2087 (playful, tech-infused humor).

explore_instead: unexpected emotional depth in simple moments
decisions: Do not revisit ocean and time themes for now due to staleness and zero engagement.
Prioritize new project creation using watcher-favorite themes, especially those blending relatable modern experiences and light humor.
Maintain a project bias to leverage momentum from watcher favorites.
Blacklist 'riddle_376_shadow_key' permanently as per watcher dislike.
Suggest a collection format to allow recurring exploration of favored themes.
Review theme engagement and project direction after 20 more creations.
